pr_title: [HUDI-1326] Added an API to force publish metrics and flush them.

timeline.author: n3nash

timeline.bodyText: What should be the right expectation if it's not initialized ? Simply returning gives a false impression to the client that it's flushed.
timeline.author: n3nash

replies.bodyText: This is inline with the shutdown() and init() functions which are fail-safe. Unless metrics are initialized there is no effect of calling these.
replies.author: prashantwason

timeline.message:
[HUDI-1326] Added an API to force publish metrics and flush them.

Using the added API, publish metrics after each level of the DAG completed in hudi-test-suite.
